thread.title: Lorde Returns With the Official Video for Her New Single “Green Light”
thread.title_full: Lorde Returns With the Official Video for Her New Single “Green Light”

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Lorde Returns With the Official Video for Her New Single “Green Light”
text:
As expected, New Zealand singer-songwriter Lorde returns from a nearly three-year hiatus this week to deliver her new single “Green Light.” Unveiled to the world via an official music video, the track acts as the lead from Lorde’s forthcoming, much-anticipated sophomore album, Melodrama .
The Grant Singer-directed clip finds the pop star making her way around town, from leaving the club, to hopping into car service, then on for a late night stroll. In short, you can expect to hear this one taking over radio waves in no time.
Be on the lookout for more from Melodrama .
